A

ACK_POLL_MS - Static variable in class com.splunk.cloudfwd.PropertyKeys
Interval (in milliseconds) to poll Splunk HEC for event batch acknowledgements.
ACK_TIMEOUT_MS - Static variable in class com.splunk.cloudfwd.PropertyKeys
Duration (in milliseconds) to wait for acknowledgements from Splunk software after sending an event batch before reporting a send failure.
ackId - Variable in class com.splunk.cloudfwd.EventBatch
 
acknowledged(EventBatch) - Method in interface com.splunk.cloudfwd.ConnectionCallbacks
The **acknowledged** function is called once for each EventBatch that has been replicated amongst Splunk Indexers.
acknowledged - Variable in class com.splunk.cloudfwd.EventBatch
 
add(Event) - Method in class com.splunk.cloudfwd.EventBatch
 
add(Event) - Method in interface com.splunk.cloudfwd.IEventBatch
 

B

BLOCKING_TIMEOUT_MS - Static variable in class com.splunk.cloudfwd.PropertyKeys
Duration (in milliseconds) that Connection.send() blocks in case that all channels are unavailable.

C

cancelEventTrackers() - Method in class com.splunk.cloudfwd.EventBatch
 
CHANNEL_DECOM_MS - Static variable in class com.splunk.cloudfwd.PropertyKeys
Interval (in milliseconds) on which channels are drained and subsequently destroyed and replaced.
CHANNELS_PER_DESTINATION - Static variable in class com.splunk.cloudfwd.PropertyKeys
Integer number of channels per internet socket address destination.
checkCompatibility(Connection.HecEndpoint) - Method in class com.splunk.cloudfwd.EventBatch
 
checkpoint(EventBatch) - Method in interface com.splunk.cloudfwd.ConnectionCallbacks
The **checkpoint** function is called when there are no unacknowledged events in-flight with an id less than or equal to events.getId().
close() - Method in class com.splunk.cloudfwd.Connection
 
closeNow() - Method in class com.splunk.cloudfwd.Connection
 
CLOUD_SSL_CERT_CONTENT - Static variable in class com.splunk.cloudfwd.PropertyKeys
Custom SSL Certificate Authority public cert content in X509 format for Splunk Cloud.
COLLECTOR_URI - Static variable in class com.splunk.cloudfwd.PropertyKeys
The url and port number for the Splunk HEC endpoint or load balancer in front of Splunk cluster.
com.splunk.cloudfwd - package com.splunk.cloudfwd
The Connection class is used to send Events to Splunk HEC with indexer acknowledgements.
Connection - Class in com.splunk.cloudfwd
Represents a reliable Connection to either the /event HEC endpoint or the /raw HEC endpoint.
Connection(ConnectionCallbacks) - Constructor for class com.splunk.cloudfwd.Connection
 
Connection(ConnectionCallbacks, Properties) - Constructor for class com.splunk.cloudfwd.Connection
 
Connection.HecEndpoint - Enum in com.splunk.cloudfwd
Used to select either structured HEC /event endpoint or /raw HEC endpoint
ConnectionCallbacks - Interface in com.splunk.cloudfwd
Callers of Connection's send methods must provide an implementation of ConnectionCallbacks to receive asynchronous notifications about their in-flight events.
